Package se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.client

Interface CMCClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCMCClient, DefaultCMCClient, PreConfiguredCMCClient
    public interface CMCClient
    Interface for a CMC API client used to perform operations on a remote CA using CMC.
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

    • Method Detail

      • getCAInformation

        CAInformation getCAInformation​(boolean forceRecache)
                        throws CMCException
        Obtain information about the remote CA
        Parameters:
        forceRecache - set to true to force this request to be sent and processed by the remote CA and set to false to allow the API to return cached information if it is reasonably fresh
        Returns:
        CA information about the remote CA
        Throws:
        CMCException - on error processing the request

      • getStaticCAInformation

        StaticCAInformation getStaticCAInformation()
                                    throws CMCException
        Obtain static information about the remote CA. This only include static non changing information about the CA and does not include dynamic changing information such as certificate count.
        Returns:
        static CA information about the remote CA
        Throws:
        CMCException - on error processing the request

      • getAllCertSerialNumbers

        CMCResponse getAllCertSerialNumbers()
                             throws CMCException
        Get a list of all certificate serial numbers in the current CA repository
        Returns:
        CMC response with certificate serial numbers or appropriate status information
        Throws:
        CMCException - error processing the request or communicating with the remote CA

      • issueCertificate

        CMCResponse issueCertificate​(se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.models.cert.CertificateModel certificateModel)
                      throws CMCException
        Issue a certificate
        Parameters:
        certificateModel - certificate model describing the content of the certificate to be issued
        Returns:
        CMC response with issued certificate or appropriate status information
        Throws:
        CMCException - error processing the request or communicating with the remote CA

      • getIssuedCertificate

        CMCResponse getIssuedCertificate​(BigInteger serialNumber)
                          throws CMCException
        Retrieve a particular certificate
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - serial number of the certificate to retrieve
        Returns:
        CMC response with the retrieved certificate or appropriate status information
        Throws:
        CMCException - error processing the request or communicating with the remote CA

      • revokeCertificate

        CMCResponse revokeCertificate​(BigInteger serialNumber,
                              int reason,
                              Date revocationDate)
                       throws CMCException
        Revoke a certificate
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - the serial number of the certificate to revoke
        reason - the reason code for the revocation
        revocationDate - the date of revocation
        Returns:
        CMC response with appropriate status information
        Throws:
        CMCException - error processing the request or communicating with the remote CA

      • listCertificates

        CMCResponse listCertificates​(int pageSize,
                             int pageIndex,
                             se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.repository.SortBy sortBy,
                             boolean notRevoked,
                             boolean descending)
                      throws CMCException
        List a range of certificates in the CA repository. This function divide certificates into pages with a fixed amount of certificates in each page. This function allows to retrieve a page of certificates and to specify the conditions for constructing this page.
        Parameters:
        pageSize - the number of certificates in each page
        pageIndex - the index of the page of the requested size to return
        sortBy - indication of whether pages of certificates should be sorted by issue date or serial number
        notRevoked - tue to exclude all revoked certificates from the pages of certificates
        descending - true to use descending sorting order
        Returns:
        the identified page of certificates
        Throws:
        CMCException - on error processing the request

      • getCertificateModelBuilder

        CMCCertificateModelBuilder getCertificateModelBuilder​(PublicKey subjectPublicKey,
                                                      se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.models.cert.CertNameModel<?> subject,
                                                      boolean includeCrlDPs,
                                                      boolean includeOcspURL)
                                               throws CMCException
        Return a certificate model builder prepared for creating certificate models for certificate requests to this CA service via CMC
        Parameters:
        subjectPublicKey - the public key of the subject
        subject - subject name data
        includeCrlDPs - true to include CRL distribution point URLs in the issued certificate
        includeOcspURL - true to include OCSP URL (if present) in the issued certificate
        Returns:
        certificate model builder
        Throws:
        CMCException - errors obtaining the certificate model builder

      • setConnectTimeout

        void setConnectTimeout​(int connectTimeout)
        Set HTTP connect timeout in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        connectTimeout - HTTP connect timeout in milliseconds

      • setReadTimeout

        void setReadTimeout​(int readTimeout)
        Set HTTP read timeout in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        readTimeout - HTTP read timeout in milliseconds

      • setTimeSkew

        void setTimeSkew​(int timeSkew)
        Set Max time skew in milliseconds allowed between client and server.
        Parameters:
        timeSkew - max time skew in milliseconds

      • setMaxAge

        void setMaxAge​(int maxAge)
        Set Max age in milliseconds for an acceptable CMC response (time skew will be added to this time).
        Parameters:
        maxAge - max age in milliseconds

      • setCaInfoMaxAge

        void setCaInfoMaxAge​(int caInfoMaxAge)
        Set CA information max age in milliseconds before a re-cache is forced
        Parameters:
        caInfoMaxAge - CA information max age in milliseconds

      • setCmcClientHttpConnector

        void setCmcClientHttpConnector​(CMCClientHttpConnector cmcClientHttpConnector)
        Set a custom CMCClientHttpConnector. A default CMC client HTTP connector will be configured if none is set.
        Parameters:
        cmcClientHttpConnector - CMC client HTTP connector
